feature.label: MonkeyTalk IDE feature
feature.description: MonkeyTalk is a functional testing tool for apps targeted at the iOS and Android operating system. MonkeyTalk can record and play back user interactions, verify screen contents and application state, and can be used interactively or run as part of a headless, fully-automated Continuous Integration process. . MonkeyTalk scripts can be recorded and/or written from scratch, using the keyword-driven MonkeyTalk scripting language or Javascript. The MonkeyTalk language supports conditional execution of platform-specific steps, iterative data-driven testing from row/column data such as a CSV file, and calling a script from a script. Tests can be written in or converted to Javascript for advanced scripting or integration.
